manifest.ext.name: URLs-LE
manifest.ext.description: 从文档、配置和代码中轻松提取URL
manifest.command.extract.title: 提取URL
manifest.command.dedupe.title: 去重URL
manifest.command.sort.title: 排序URL
manifest.command.help.title: 帮助与故障排除
manifest.command.settings.title: 打开设置
manifest.settings.title: URLs-LE设置
manifest.settings.copy.clipboard.desc: 自动将提取结果复制到剪贴板
manifest.settings.dedupe.desc: 启用提取URL的自动去重功能
manifest.settings.open.new-file.desc: 在新编辑器中打开后处理内容
manifest.settings.open.side-by-side.desc: 在新侧边编辑器中打开提取结果
manifest.settings.safety.enabled.desc: 启用大文件及操作的安全检查
当输入文件大小超过此字节阈值时发出警告
manifest.settings.safety.warn.large-outp: 当结果行数超过此阈值时在打开/复制前发出警告
manifest.settings.safety.warn.many-docum: 当结果文档数量超过此阈值时在打开前发出警告
manifest.settings.parse-errors.desc: 解析失败时以 VS Code 通知形式显示解析错误
manifest.settings.statusbar.enabled.desc: 显示URL-LE状态栏入口以便快速访问
manifest.settings.telemetry.desc: 启用仅本地遥测日志至输出面板
manifest.capability.untrusted-workspaces: 不受信任工作区功能受限
runtime.sort.success: 已排序 {0} 个URL（共 {1} 个）
runtime.dedupe.success: 移除 {0} 个重复 URL（剩余 {1} 个）
runtime.error.unknown: 检测到大文件（{0} 字节）。提取可能耗时较长。
runtime.error.file-system: 结果过多——打开{0}个文档（约{1}行）。继续？
runtime.warning.clipboard-too-large: 输入列索引（逗号分隔），留空表示全部列
runtime.warning.clipboard-access-denied: 输入有效列索引（逗号分隔），留空表示全部列
runtime.warning.safety-check-failed: 列索引超出范围（{0}）。将使用全部列
runtime.status.extracting: 备用方案（正则表达式模式）
runtime.help.title: URLs-LE Help
runtime.help.quick-start:
1. Open a file with URLs (Markdown, HTML, JSON, etc.)
2. Run "URLs-LE: Extract URLs"
3. View extracted URLs in results
runtime.help.commands:
**Extract URLs**: Extract from current document
**Sort URLs**: Sort alphabetically, by domain, or by length
**Deduplicate URLs**: Remove duplicate URLs
**Settings**: Configure options
runtime.help.formats:
**Supported**: Markdown, HTML, JSON, YAML, XML, JavaScript, CSS, Plain text
**URL Formats**: HTTP/HTTPS, FTP, File, Data URLs, Mailto, Tel, Relative, Absolute
runtime.help.troubleshooting:
**No URLs found?** Check file format and URL patterns
**Performance issues?** Enable safety settings for large files
**Need help?** Check Output panel for details
runtime.help.settings:
Access via Command Palette: "URLs-LE: Open Settings"
Key settings: Copy to clipboard, side-by-side view, safety checks, notification levels
